name: Your Cat Lives In A Democracy
name_original: Your Cat Lives In A Democracy
description:
Remember: your cat is happy to live in a democracy, it could be worse.

Done for the WHGJ in reaction to the French elections.

I wasted most of the time to reproduce Gaeel's fire effect.
